text: The Arizona Wildcats college football team competes as part of the National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I Football Bowl Subdivision (FBS), representing the University of Arizona in the South Division of the Pac-12 Conference (Pac-12). Since the establishment of the team in 1893, Arizona has appeared in 21 bowl games and had 9 wins, 11 losses, and 1 tie for a .452 winning percentage.Bowl/All-Star Game Records, p. 14 One of their losses was to Boise State in one of the New Year's Six bowl games, the Fiesta Bowl. They are still currently the only team out of all 20 original teams in the original Pac-10 and Big Ten conferences to not have played in the Rose Bowl. ==Key== {| class="wikitable" |+General |- | style="text-align:center"| | Bowl game record attendance |- | style="text-align:center"| | Former bowl game record attendance |- | style="text-align:center"| * | Denotes National Championship Game |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Results |- | style="background:#dfd;"| W | Win |- | style="background:#fcc;"| L | Loss |} ==Post-season games== {|class="wikitable" |+ List of bowl games showing bowl played in, score, date, season, opponent, stadium, location, attendance and head coach !
